data.title: All-Time NBA Draft History
data.meta_description: Recapping every NBA Draft from 1947 to the present
data.text:
Every Draft Pick In History:

>> All-time picks sorted by draft year, franchises and college affiliation

Click on the year below for all picks from a specific Draft year.
